pr_title: feat: block startup if embedded artemis port already in use

timeline.message: feat: change default artemis port to 25672, adds ArtemisPortChecker that will block DHIS2 startup if port is already in use.

timeline.bodyText: Could we use a Slf4j logger instead of system.err? Or no point?
timeline.author: larshelge

replies.bodyText: It will look kinda weird? since it adds extra info... not sure, its easy enough to add it, its a bit different from normal "logging"
replies.author: mortenoh

replies.bodyText: I think in this specific case it does make sense to use System.err since the log files would be filled with data which is not really useful. It have to be quite apparent that the server can't start.
replies.author: luciano-fiandesio
